mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER ( MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_PASSWD, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_RANK, MEMBER_DELETE, MEMBER_VISITCOUNT ) VALUES ( #{MEMBER_ID}, #{MEMBER_NAME}, #{MEMBER_NICKNAME}, #{MEMBER_PASSWD}, #{MEMBER_EMAIL}, #{MEMBER_RANK}, #{MEMBER_DELETE}, #{MEMBER_VISITCOUNT} )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{MEMBER_ID}
SELECT COUNT(MEMBER_EMAIL) cnt FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_EMAIL = #{MEMBER_EMAIL}
